Clear All Archives
Mod sounds
Show prompts
Delete all unpinned archives from the current save.
Play sounds on various triggers, such as deleting archives.
Open an 'Are you sure?' dialogue on various triggers, such as deleting archives.
If disabled, new notifications will not be saved.
Filter letter notifications.\n\nLetters are event pop-ups such as "Eclipse" or "Raid".
Filter message notifications.\n\nMessages are text pop-ups displayed briefly at the top of the screen.
Filter by keyword or phrase.\n\nYou may input dates, colonist names etc.
{0}\n\nLeft-click: open (if available).\n\nRight-click: pin or delete archives.
No active game found.
Cannot clear archives if the list is empty or if there is no active game.
Cannot delete pinned archives.

Delete Old Archives
Delete All Archives
You are attempting to delete <color=red>ALL UNPINNED ARCHIVES</color> stored in the active safe file.\n\nAre you sure you want to delete all saved data?
This action will delete the selected archive.\n\nAre you sure you want to delete this archive?
This action will delete all archives older than the selected archive.\n\nPinned archives will not be deleted.\n\nAre you sure you want to delete these archives?
